resources.string: The download is complete, click to update.

Intelligent cloud fire security management system, composed of wireless smoke detectors and wireless network cameras, intelligent fire alarm, video surveillance, intelligent cloud platform remote centralized management, to provide customers with exclusive intelligent disaster prevention solutions. Can be widely used in residential quarters, nursing homes, student dormitories, chain stores and other places.
